entry.title: 工具函数
entry.content: ![工具函数](https://makotobuto.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/picgo/mak_20198101127.jpg?Expires=1565413561&OSSAccessKeyId=TMP.hX4oCf1JcW7kjyCYpo2ECWSzj6wdiBJQsbvVXF5jSAmVFe5CzE3PXAD6qsgiQCMRa5egqTBPen7ZayPtWvhoqmg1CYFuZ761H6juNBD67RTbqAHZMp4NPsR2exmLwJ.tmp&Signature=JjHVXGFGo2GIfBLjmkMa64Om7es%3D =300x) 字符串转数组对象12345678910111213141516171819202122232425// 字符串数据结构var str = '{"fileId":20945,"folderId":1,"uploadId":1401,"name":"2019-7-10 10-25-49.JPG","urlName":"6a957d583561508.JPG"},{"fileId":20952,"folderId":1,"uploadId":1409,"name":"Koala.jpg","urlName":"4b6981873d21c8e.jpg"},{"fileId":20951,"folderId":1,"uploadId":1408,"name":"Koala.jpg","urlName":"e7a9380346ce52a.jpg"}' function setAttachmentValue(data) { if (data) { var _dataStr = data.substring(0, data.length).replace(/},{/g, '},,{').replace(/\[/g, '').replace(/\]/g, ''); if (_dataStr.indexOf(',,') > -1) { data = _dataStr.split(",,"); } else { var _array = new Array(); var _objStr = _dataStr.replace(/\[/g, '').replace(/\]/g, ''); _array.push(_objStr) data = _array } for (var u = 0; u < data.length; u++) { if (data[u] && data[u].length > 0) { var attachmentObj = JSON.parse(data[u].substring(0, data[u].length)); data[u] = attachmentObj } } return data } else { return [] } }
